dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: A visitor? What an unexpected surprise! Please, come in, come in!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm looking for a man named Braxton. He supposedly came by here.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Thanks. Don't mind if I do.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Actually, I think I'll be going.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm afraid we don't get many visitors out here - the raptidons and marauders scare off all but the boldest.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: And if you've braved them, you must be exhausted. Why don't you stay for dinner?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Are you sure you haven't seen Braxton? I heard he was delivering medicine to you.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm sure I would remember something like that!

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Now, quit fretting yourself about that. Make yourself at home - dinner's almost ready.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Now, please try to relax. Undue stress tends to spoil the meal, you know.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: You must be famished! So are we, my friend, but one can't rush a fine meal.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Excellent! You've arrived at just the right time. My wife is putting the finishing touches on dinner.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Please, make yourself at home until it's ready.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Nonsense! We're too far from the safety of Stellar Bay to deny a traveler hospitality.

dialog.speaker: Edger (Male)
dialog.utterance: Stay for dinner, at least. I insist.
